channel.title: Player updating procedure - Netty
channel.description: Hi, I've been stuck on this for quite a while now. The client receives all the packets (messages throughout chat (opcode 253), player's id (opcode 249), camera (opcode 107), etc) but player updating (opcode 81). For some reason, the server can encode it and write it out using the ChannelBuffer but the client isn't receiving it to decode and use it accordingly. Would anyone happen to know why?

item.title: Player updating procedure - Netty
item.dc:creator: @Continue Continue
item.description:
@Continue wrote:

Hi, I’ve been stuck on this for quite a while now. The client receives all the packets (messages throughout chat (opcode 253), player’s id (opcode 249), camera (opcode 107), etc) but player updating (opcode 81). For some reason, the server can encode it and write it out using the ChannelBuffer but the client isn’t receiving it to decode and use it accordingly. Would anyone happen to know why?

Read full topic
